channel.title: Laptop problem
channel.description:
I have a Compaq Evo N600c laptop.
Whilst typing I must have accidentally pressed a combination of keys that has changed the size of the screen.
I now have a screen display with a wide black border surrounding it. The only "solution" is maxing the resolution but then the text and the icons look real small.

item.title: Laptop problem
item.dc:creator: LimitBreak
item.description:
Next time, you can use the edit button to edit your post instead of having to double post.

Read full topic
